fields.name: Cold
fields.description: You're not moved by emotional appeals or social bonds.

fields.name: Haunted
fields.description: You're often lost in reverie, reliving past horrors, seeing things.

fields.name: Obsessed
fields.description: You're enthralled by one thing: an activity, a person, an ideology.

fields.name: Paranoid
fields.description: You imagine danger everywhere; you can't trust others.

fields.name: Reckless
fields.description: You have little regard for your own safety or best interests.

fields.name: Soft
fields.description: You lose your edge; you become sentimental, passive, gentle.

fields.name: Unstable
fields.description: Your emotional state is volatile. You can instantly rage, or fall into despair, act impulsively, or freeze up.

fields.name: Vicious
fields.description: You seek out opportunities to hurt people, even for no good reason.
